oscar.name: NetBootMgr
oscar.summary: Manage next network boot for a cluster
oscar.description: Netbootmgr provides a GUI interface for managing the next boot action for network booted hosts. It does so by using pxelinux' or elilo.efi's capability to load an IP specific configuration file from the network. Netbootmgr creates/deletes symbolic links pointing to predefined pxelinux/elilo config files.
